attributes.action: appeal to the Directors of Chelsea Football Club to retain Jose Mourinho as manager at the end of this season
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jose Mourinho is quite simply the best manager that Chelsea Football Club has ever had.

In his first season at Chelsea he managed us to our first championship title for 50 years. In his first two years he won two Premierships, the Carling League Cup and the Community Shield. 

This season he has won us the Carling League Cup and taken us to the semi-finals of the Champion's League and the FA Cup. Our squad has been ravaged by injury yet he has guided us back to within 3 points of the leaders who we have yet to play at home.

We ask your assistance to plead common sense with the Directors of the Club....Jose must stay!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
